channel.title: biodigitaljazz.net
channel.description: Given that you're following this blog, and the fact that you even use RSS in the first place, you will probably be delighted to know that I "hand-crafted" this RSS feed. Why do we always set up some convoluted auto-generation pipeline for RSS? "It's just markup, y'all." I will leave you with a factoid. I have a buddy who hates the phrase "hand-crafted". It's his pet peeve because people often use that phrase inaccurately and disingenuously. "Oh, you "hand-crafted" your whiskey? Really? Please tell me more about how you hand-boiled off the water during the distillation phase??"

item.title: The eleventh circle of hell: setting up an RPi camera module
item.description: Don't trust the community content; rely solely on the official docs.
